title: Martin Knapp: Curbing economics costs in public and mental health [Video]
itunes:author: Professor Martin Knapp
description: Contributor(s): Professor Martin Knapp | More funding directed towards counselling and psychotherapy services in the UK could help curb escalating costs in public and mental health and ensure the country’s future wellbeing. This is the consensus of a new, independent report authored by Professor Martin Knapp, Director of the Personal Social Services Research Unit and Professor of Social Policy at LSE.
